jtbd.name: Jobs-to-be-Done
jtbd.template: When [situation], I want to [motivation], so I can [outcome].
jtbd.example: When I'm preparing for a sales call, I want to quickly research the prospect, so I can personalize my pitch and close the deal.

template.agitate: Make it feel urgent and painful
template.solution: Present your product as the answer

example.problem: You're building a great product but can't find customers.
example.agitate: Every day without revenue is a day closer to running out of runway. Your competitors are getting ahead while you're stuck guessing.
example.solution: Revenue OS analyzes your product and tells you exactly who will buy, what to say, and how to reach them.

example.before: Spending weeks guessing who your customers are, writing generic pitches that get ignored
example.after: Knowing exactly who to target, with personalized messaging that converts

unique_mechanism.name: Unique Mechanism
unique_mechanism.template: The only [category] that [unique differentiator] because of [mechanism].
unique_mechanism.example: The only monetization tool that analyzes your actual codebase to generate personalized go-to-market strategy.

template.value: What that means for your life/business

example.advantage: Understands your specific product, not generic advice
example.benefit: Know exactly who to sell to
example.value: Stop wasting time on the wrong customers, close deals faster
